name: Airplane Truck Mission 3D
description:
People anxiously wait for the transport games. Here is your chance to play one of the best transport game including container around the american car parking and other pretty parking building. just load the car to american truck. In this game you have to load the cars into the truck and when all the cars are loaded then you will have to drive the truck to the next mentioned spot.
Features
HD and related graphic.
Reasonable city environment
Trailers trucks driving experience.
Travel around the city road environment
